prodNameC: 倍利爾樂 厭氧血液培養瓶
ingredientsDesc: The 40 ml of media formulation consists of pancreatic digest of casein (1.36% w/v), papaic digest of soybean meal (0.24% w/v), sodium polyanetholesulfonate (0.035% w/v), menadione (0.00005%w/v), hemin (0.0005% w/v) ,yeast extract (0.376%/v),pyridoxine hydrochloride (0.0008% w/v),pyruvic acid (sodium salt, 0.08% w/v), reducing agents and other complex amino acid and carbohydrate substrates in purified water.

efficacy: 檢測和分離人體血液和其他正常無菌體液中的厭氧微生物。
